mapper.insert: insert into file(file_path, file_type_id, file_origin_name, file_name) values (#{filePath},#{fileTypeId},#{fileOriginName},#{fileName})
mapper.select: select file_id, file_path, file_type_id, file_origin_name, file_name, file_date from file where file_path = #{filePath} and file_type_id = #{fileTypeId}
select file_id, file_path, file_type_id, file_origin_name, file_name, file_date from file where file_name = #{fileName}
mapper.delete: delete from file where file_path = #{filePath} and file_type_id = #{fileTypeId}
